$interpreted: Barbara: Argh! Failed again...
Charle: Stop trying.
Charle: Against the Forbidden Rune, even concentrated Soul Energy has issues, let alone magic attacks. Conserve your energy.
Barbara: So we're just supposed to wait around until we're slaughtered?
Barbara: There are still students who have not awakened due to injuries. Even my most basic healing runes are useless!
Charle: Their injuries are serious, for sure. But they will last the night. Do not be anxious...
Barbara: I can't just stay here and do nothing.
Barbara: I'm not like you, sir! A headmaster who only speaks disheartening words!
Tica: Oooo, a reaction!
Charle: The Rune Guardian...what are you doing!?
Tica: Fixin' it.
Tica: Basic rune attacks don't work, so I gotta try something else~
Charle: Cut it out! That's too dangerous!
Charle: The Rune Guardian is...a failed project. At the time, Morris and I had...
Charle: In any case, enough!
Tica: Ehhh~~? But...
Charle: No "buts".
Charle: ...*breathes*...
Charle: You two, calm down.
Charle: We must think of a safer strategy.
Barbara: There is no strategy. That was left by Samuel Balzac. It's obviously an unfinished piece...
Tica: Oh, so the Forbidden Rune is old?
Charle: Before creating the modern system of runes with his partners, Samuel Balzac drafted many prototypes.
Charle: The Forbidden Rune was merely one of them...
Charle: Even though it has its defects, it is incomplete.
Charle: When it was accidentally discovered that it could collapse all rune techniques, the Academy sealed it off.
Charle: This was true for both schools of thought; research was not allowed.
Tica: Why? Shouldn't it be researched specifically because it's not understood?
Barbara: It's not as simple as you think...
Charle: Humans use runes to control Soul Energy, and runes are man-made after all.
Charle: As you can see, when encountering the Forbidden Rune, Soul Energy doesn't disappear, but runes still fail.
Charle: The existence of the Forbidden Rune proves that there is a loophole in the modern rune system.
Charle: Hence being completely useless in the face of this unfinished rune.
Tica: So...
Charle: The academic world believes that if the existence of the Forbidden Rune is admitted...
Charle: ...that would be to admit that the rune system we've been researching all this time is wrong on a fundamental level.
Tica: But...but you can't just simply hide from it. Isn't that lying to yourself and others?
Charle: Yes. So, I can understand Morris' anger...
Zola: Didn't I tell you that you were fakes?
Tica: Ooo~Listening in on other's conversations is not very nice!
Zola: Hmph. The caster cannot be too far from the spell. All I can do is wait outside.
Zola: But I'm impatient~I don't want to wait until tomorrow!
Zola: Hehe~It appears that the new Immortal's speculation was correct.
Zola: The runes we use, the true runes, are not affected by the Forbidden Rune.
Zola: ——Now you shall die!
Barbara: Stop! Don't do it!
Barbara: The Dracontines and the Bequeathers have always cooperated.
Barbara: That year when we delayed settling our accounts, you were able to escape being hunted down by the Kingdom of the Sun.
Barbara: At least let the students go for that!
Zola: ...Makes sense.
Barbara: Thank God...
Barbara: ...*gasp*...!
Zola: I had almost forgotten.
Zola: If the Balzac family hadn't been so greedy for life, so fearful of death, our sect would have completed our plan long ago!
Zola: Shirley...
Zola: I hate him! I hate him so much!! That despicable Theodore Carlos!
Tica: No!
Charle: Tica, don't!
Li-Hwa: Found~~you~~ya~
Li-Hwa: So this is where ya'll are. I was curious where everyone went.
Zola: And who are you?
Li-Hwa: Just a visitor who happened to be stopping by. Looking pretty good though, wouldn't you say?
Zola: Hmph. You shall join them in the grave.
Tica: The wound is too deep...if she's not healed soon, she's done!
Tica: Headmaster Ceres, I'm sorry!
Tica: It's time to cause trouble! I'll stay back a year, yeah, who cares!
Charle: Tica! Stop!
Tica: Got it~!
Tica: From here on out, your name is...Rune Guardian 2.0!
Tica: Eh? Wait! Wait!!
Charle: Tica!
Charle: Miss Li-Hwa, please help her! She's my student!
Li-Hwa: But...
Charle: I'll hold her back! Please!
Charle: I don't want to lose another student!
Li-Hwa: ...Okay, I trust you.
Li-Hwa: Hold on!
Zola: So you think you can stop me, eh?
Zola: If I don't make you suffer, surely you wouldn't think highly of me?
Zola: Fine. Just try to stop me!

You shall join them in the grave.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_003_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The wound is too deep...if she's not healed soon, she's done!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_003_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Headmaster Ceres, I'm sorry!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_003_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's time to cause trouble! I'll stay back a year, yeah, who cares!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_003_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Tica! Please!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_003_dialog_english##_33_002","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I don't want to lose another student!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_003_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Li-Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Okay, I trust you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_003_dialog_english##_34_001","SpeakerName":"Li-Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hold on!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_003_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3228c3","IconName":"h3228c3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So you think you can stop me, eh?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_003_dialog_english##_35_001","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3228c3","IconName":"h3228c3_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If I don't make you suffer, surely you wouldn't think highly of me?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_003_dialog_english##_35_002","SpeakerName":"Zola","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3228c3","IconName":"h3228c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Fine.
